India strongly condemned Munir's "nuclear sabre-rattling" and questioned the safety of Pakistan's nuclear arsenal. Despite Pakistan's threats, India's military strength surpasses Pakistan's, with a larger active military and a growing nuclear arsenal.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/if-we-are-going-down-pakistan-asim-munir-threatens-to-target-rils-jamnagar-refinery-shows-intent-to-hit-indias-economic-assets/articleshow/123250360.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/if-we-are-going-down-pakistan-asim-munir-threatens-to-target-rils-jamnagar-refinery-shows-intent-to-hit-indias-economic-assets/articleshow/123250360.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 10:55:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1077529" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123250488,imgsize-1077529.cms"/></item><item><title>'Process of removal should begin': Panel formed to probe Justice Varma cash row</title><description><![CDATA[Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla has formed a three-member committee to probe allegations against Justice Yashwant Varma related to a “cash-at-home” controversy. The panel includes senior advocate P.V. Acharya, Justice Aravind Kumar of the Supreme Court, and Madras High Court Chief Justice Manindra Mohan Shrivastava.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/cash-at-home-row-lok-sabha-speaker-om-birla-forms-3-member-panel-to-investigate-justice-varma-case-who-is-in-the-committee/articleshow/123252337.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/cash-at-home-row-lok-sabha-speaker-om-birla-forms-3-member-panel-to-investigate-justice-varma-case-who-is-in-the-committee/articleshow/123252337.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 12:20:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="882097" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123252359,imgsize-882097.cms"/></item><item><title>'Public safety, animal welfare go hand in hand': Rahul on SC's stray dog order</title><description><![CDATA[Rahul Gandhi opposed the Supreme Court's order on relocating stray dogs. He called it a step back from humane policies. The court directed that Delhi-NCR localities should be free of stray dogs. It also ordered no captured dogs to be released back. The court warned against obstructing the capture drive. Police detained animal rights activists protesting the decision at India Gate.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/public-safety-animal-welfare-go-hand-in-hand-rahul-on-scs-stray-dog-order-terms-blanket-removals-cruel/articleshow/123252143.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/public-safety-animal-welfare-go-hand-in-hand-rahul-on-scs-stray-dog-order-terms-blanket-removals-cruel/articleshow/123252143.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 12:16:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1293736" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123252192,imgsize-1293736.cms"/></item><item><title>'Ram was out of his mind': Tamil poet Vairamuthi's remarks sparks row</title><description><![CDATA[Lyricist Vairamuthu's recent remarks on Lord Ram, claiming he was 'out of his mind' after separating from Sita, have ignited controversy in Tamil Nadu. Vairamuthu's comments, made at a Kambar Kazhagam event, drew sharp criticism from TN BJP President Nainar Nagenthran, who deemed them 'anti-Hindu'.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chennai/ram-was-out-of-his-mind-tamil-poet-vairamuthis-remarks-sparks-row-anti-hindu-says-bjp/articleshow/123253935.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chennai/ram-was-out-of-his-mind-tamil-poet-vairamuthis-remarks-sparks-row-anti-hindu-says-bjp/articleshow/123253935.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 13:37:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="12458" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123253944,imgsize-12458.cms"/></item><item><title>Gurgaon techie who flashed woman arrested; was returning from son's PTM</title><description><![CDATA[In a troubling incident, the Gurgaon police have taken into custody Abhilash Kumar, a 32-year-old MTech graduate, for allegedly harassing a woman at Rajiv Chowk on August 2nd. The assistant manager, hailing from Karnal, was arrested in Sector 49 after a meticulous investigation that included reviewing CCTV footage.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/gurgaon/32-year-old-techie-arrested-in-sexual-harassment-case-in-gurgaon/articleshow/123244542.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/gurgaon/32-year-old-techie-arrested-in-sexual-harassment-case-in-gurgaon/articleshow/123244542.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 01:03:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="618680" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123249063,imgsize-618680.cms"/></item><item><title>GitHub CEO Thomas Dohmke resigns: Decides to leave; to become…</title><description><![CDATA[GitHub CEO Thomas Dohmke has resigned, prompting a significant restructuring as the platform integrates into Microsoft's CoreAI team under Jay Parikh. Dohmke, who is departing to found a new venture, will remain until the end of 2025 to aid in the transition. GitHub Copilot, boasting over 20 million users, will be a key component of Microsoft's AI strategy.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/github-ceo-thomas-dohmke-resigns-ive-decided-to-leaveto-become-/articleshow/123240627.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/github-ceo-thomas-dohmke-resigns-ive-decided-to-leaveto-become-/articleshow/123240627.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 21:50:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="700835" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123240611,imgsize-700835.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Husband’s sperm count too low’: Father-in-law, relative rape Gujarat woman</title><description><![CDATA[A Vadodara woman filed a police report. She accused her father-in-law and sister-in-law's husband of repeated rape. The motive was to impregnate her due to her husband's low sperm count. She also accused her husband of blackmail after a miscarriage. The incidents occurred between February and July 2024. Police have registered a First Information Report and are investigating the case.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/vadodara/for-heir-father-in-law-and-relative-rape-woman-repeatedly/articleshow/123244131.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/vadodara/for-heir-father-in-law-and-relative-rape-woman-repeatedly/articleshow/123244131.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 02:30:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="889014" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123248162,imgsize-889014.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Bound to have defects’: EC defends Bihar voter roll exercise; SC seeks details</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court is currently reviewing petitions challenging the Election Commission's decision to conduct a Special Intensive Revision of electoral rolls in Bihar. Allegations of discrepancies, such as inaccuracies in voter status, have been raised by petitioners.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bound-to-have-defects-ec-defends-bihar-voter-roll-exercise-sc-seeks-details/articleshow/123253782.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bound-to-have-defects-ec-defends-bihar-voter-roll-exercise-sc-seeks-details/articleshow/123253782.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 13:28:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1289834" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123253771,imgsize-1289834.cms"/></item><item><title>Grok suspended over Gaza comments? Musk calls it ‘dumb error’</title><description><![CDATA[Elon Musk's AI chatbot, Grok, faced a brief suspension from X, sparking controversy after it attributed the removal to comments about Israel's actions in Gaza, citing ICJ rulings and UN reports. Musk dismissed this, attributing the suspension to a "dumb error.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/us-israel-committing-genocide-grok-suspended-over-gaza-comments-musk-calls-it-dumb-error/articleshow/123249327.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/us-israel-committing-genocide-grok-suspended-over-gaza-comments-musk-calls-it-dumb-error/articleshow/123249327.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 09:28:39 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="21466" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123249352,imgsize-21466.cms"/></item><item><title>Indian IT layoffs: AI may not be the only reason; a ‘deeper problem’ in GCC trend they missed</title><description><![CDATA[India's IT sector faces a double whammy: the rise of Global Capability Centres (GCCs) and the integration of Artificial Intelligence. GCCs, in-house tech hubs of multinational corporations, are challenging traditional outsourcing, offering better control and cost efficiency.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/how-ai-may-not-be-the-only-reason-behind-indian-it-layoffs-but-this-deeper-problem-in-the-gcc-trend-they-missed/articleshow/123230290.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/how-ai-may-not-be-the-only-reason-behind-indian-it-layoffs-but-this-deeper-problem-in-the-gcc-trend-they-missed/articleshow/123230290.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 12:01:19 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="58486" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123230275,imgsize-58486.cms"/></item><item><title>Uttarakhand flash flood aftermath: Temporary lake formed in Harsil poses new risk</title><description><![CDATA[A temporary lake near Harsil, formed after the Dharali flash flood, poses a threat to downstream areas. Authorities are working to drain the lake safely. Geologists are assessing the lake's stability. SDRF personnel are clearing obstructions. The Army is overseeing operations. Road restoration is hampered by the lake and ongoing rain. NDMA has ordered constant surveillance and safe water release.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/uttarakhand-flash-flood-aftermath-temporary-lake-formed-in-harsil-poses-new-risk-army-work-to-secure-it-as-ndma-orders-constant-surveillance/articleshow/123247858.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/uttarakhand-flash-flood-aftermath-temporary-lake-formed-in-harsil-poses-new-risk-army-work-to-secure-it-as-ndma-orders-constant-surveillance/articleshow/123247858.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 07:17:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>KALYAN DAS AND GAURAV TALWAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1448369" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123247940,imgsize-1448369.cms"/></item><item><title>How much will Ronaldo have to pay if he splits with Georgina Rodriguez?</title><description><![CDATA[Georgina Rodríguez, now engaged to Cristiano Ronaldo, has amassed a $10 million fortune through modelling, reality TV, and entrepreneurial ventures. Their engagement was announced on August 11 on Instagram. While Ronaldo boasts a billion-dollar net worth, safeguards are reportedly in place: Rodríguez would receive a substantial monthly pension and Ronaldo's Madrid mansion if they separate.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/what-is-georgina-rodriguezs-net-worth-how-much-will-cristiano-ronaldo-have-to-pay-if-they-split/articleshow/123252863.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/what-is-georgina-rodriguezs-net-worth-how-much-will-cristiano-ronaldo-have-to-pay-if-they-split/articleshow/123252863.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 13:00:39 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1109394" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123253081,imgsize-1109394.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Unscientific and inhumane': Activists say SC order goes against govt's 2023 rule</title><description><![CDATA[Animal welfare activists are up in arms against a recent Supreme Court order mandating the relocation of stray dogs, citing violations of the Animal Birth Control Rules, 2023. They emphasize the absence of government-run dog shelters in Delhi-NCR and the impracticality of mass relocation without proper census data.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/unscientific-and-inhumane-activists-say-supreme-court-order-goes-against-govts-2023-rule-peta-for-effective-sterilisation-programme/articleshow/123248256.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/unscientific-and-inhumane-activists-say-supreme-court-order-goes-against-govts-2023-rule-peta-for-effective-sterilisation-programme/articleshow/123248256.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 08:07:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="117578" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123248304,imgsize-117578.cms"/></item><item><title>Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella to staff: Not enough to be a software factory; calls for innovation</title><description><![CDATA[Microsoft is undergoing a significant shift, transitioning from a software manufacturer to an "intelligence engine," according to CEO Satya Nadella. This transformation aims to democratize AI, empowering global users to create their own intelligent tools. Microsoft will focus on building AI systems that enable individuals and organizations to develop customized solutions, redesigning its technology stack to support this new vision.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/microsoft-ceo-satya-nadella-to-employees-its-no-longer-enough-to-be-software-factory-must-become/articleshow/123230971.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/microsoft-ceo-satya-nadella-to-employees-its-no-longer-enough-to-be-software-factory-must-become/articleshow/123230971.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 12:34:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1442730" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123230971,imgsize-1442730.cms"/></item><item><title>'Don't want you to be comfortable': Did Trump just roast the press? Watch video</title><description><![CDATA[President Trump, during a press conference announcing the federalization of Washington, DC, dismissed a reporter's request for a larger press briefing room, jokingly stating he didn't want the press to be comfortable. This remark drew laughter from officials and reporters present. Trump also declared "Liberation Day in DC," vowing to eliminate crime and improve the capital.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/dont-want-you-to-be-comfortable-did-donald-trump-just-roast-the-press-watch-video/articleshow/123249049.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/dont-want-you-to-be-comfortable-did-donald-trump-just-roast-the-press-watch-video/articleshow/123249049.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 09:20:16 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="823880" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123249071,imgsize-823880.cms"/></item><item><title>Woman injured in tree fall dies after ambulance stuck for hours on pothole-ridden NH-48</title><description><![CDATA[Chhaaya Purav, 49, tragically died after a tree fell on her at her former school in Palghar. While being transported to a Mumbai hospital, the ambulance became trapped in a severe traffic jam on the pothole-filled Mumbai-Ahmedabad highway. The delay exacerbated her injuries, and she was pronounced dead upon arrival at a closer hospital.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/injured-woman-dies-in-ambulance-after-spending-hours-stuck-in-traffic-on-mumbai-ahmedabad-highway/articleshow/123240055.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/injured-woman-dies-in-ambulance-after-spending-hours-stuck-in-traffic-on-mumbai-ahmedabad-highway/articleshow/123240055.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 21:00:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>VISHAL RAJEMAHADIK AND PRESS TRUST OF INDIA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1006047" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123248331,imgsize-1006047.cms"/></item><item><title>Nasa teases major discovery: Mystery object speeds through solar system</title><description><![CDATA[NASA has shared new details about 3I/ATLAS. It is an interstellar object moving at 209,000 km/h. Hubble images show it is smaller than thought, about 5.6 km wide. It is a comet with a glowing tail. Scientists estimate it is eight billion years old. It poses no threat to Earth. NASA uses telescopes to study it.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/nasa-shares-thrilling-update-on-the-mysterious-interstellar-object-racing-through-our-solar-system/articleshow/123254304.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/nasa-shares-thrilling-update-on-the-mysterious-interstellar-object-racing-through-our-solar-system/articleshow/123254304.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 14:03:41 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="19328" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123254310,imgsize-19328.cms"/></item><item><title>Weed behind bars: Ganja-filled ball thrown into Maharashtra jail</title><description><![CDATA[A security lapse at Beed district prison led to a violent clash among four undertrial prisoners after an unidentified person threw a rubber ball filled with ganja into the facility. The inmates fought over the distribution of the contraband, prompting jail staff intervention and a police investigation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/aurangabad/ganja-filled-ball-thrown-into-beed-jail-triggers-violent-clash-4-including-bjp-mlas-aide-khokya-bhosale-booked/articleshow/123244233.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/aurangabad/ganja-filled-ball-thrown-into-beed-jail-triggers-violent-clash-4-including-bjp-mlas-aide-khokya-bhosale-booked/articleshow/123244233.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 00:43:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>MOHAMMED AKHEF</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="34168" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123250781,imgsize-34168.cms"/></item><item><title>Nitish Katara murder case: SC rules no jail beyond fixed term</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court of India has mandated the immediate release of convicts across all states and union territories who have completed their court-mandated sentences, provided they are not implicated in other cases. This directive follows the court's concern about prisoners being detained beyond their sentence terms. The order was issued during the case of Sukhdev Yadav, convicted in the Nitish Katara murder, who finished his 20-year sentence in March.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/2002-nitish-katara-murder-case-no-jail-beyond-fixed-term-rules-supreme-court-slams-delay-in-releasing-prisoners/articleshow/123252550.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/2002-nitish-katara-murder-case-no-jail-beyond-fixed-term-rules-supreme-court-slams-delay-in-releasing-prisoners/articleshow/123252550.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 13:08:26 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="161204" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123252495,imgsize-161204.cms"/></item><item><title>How Indian cities tackle stray dog issue; Netherlands ended it with 'benchmark model'</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court has mandated the removal of stray dogs in Delhi-NCR, directing their confinement to shelters. Various Indian cities employ different strategies, including sterilization programs, designated feeding zones, and compensation for bite victims. The Netherlands eradicated its stray dog issue through comprehensive measures like sterilization, strict animal welfare laws, and promoting adoption.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/from-mumbai-to-kochi-how-indian-cities-tackle-stray-dog-menace-netherlands-ended-it-with-benchmark-model/articleshow/123248169.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/from-mumbai-to-kochi-how-indian-cities-tackle-stray-dog-menace-netherlands-ended-it-with-benchmark-model/articleshow/123248169.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 08:04:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="154742" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123251534,imgsize-154742.cms"/></item><item><title>Bhutto issues warning to India over Indus; follows Munir’s N-threat</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/we-do-not-bow-bilawal-bhutto-issues-warning-to-india-over-indus-water-treaty-follows-pakistan-army-chief-asim-munirs-nuclear-threat/articleshow/123252008.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/we-do-not-bow-bilawal-bhutto-issues-warning-to-india-over-indus-water-treaty-follows-pakistan-army-chief-asim-munirs-nuclear-threat/articleshow/123252008.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 12:03:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="531977" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123252037,imgsize-531977.cms"/></item><item><title>Fresh trouble for Nayara Energy: SBI stops trade & forex transactions</title><description><![CDATA[State Bank of India has ceased trade and foreign currency dealings with Nayara Energy due to potential US sanctions, prioritizing compliance with international rules. This decision, made after recent US tariff hikes and EU sanctions, impacts Nayara's international transactions. Nayara is now seeking alternative arrangements with domestic institutions like UCO Bank to navigate these challenges.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/fresh-trouble-for-russia-backed-nayara-energy-sbi-stops-trade-foreign-currency-transactions-of-indian-refinery-doesnt-want-to-risk-us-tariffs-eu-curbs/articleshow/123252387.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/fresh-trouble-for-russia-backed-nayara-energy-sbi-stops-trade-foreign-currency-transactions-of-indian-refinery-doesnt-want-to-risk-us-tariffs-eu-curbs/articleshow/123252387.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 12:37:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="57020" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123252714,imgsize-57020.cms"/></item><item><title>Who is Georgina Rodriguez? Cristiano Ronaldo’s fiancée</title><description><![CDATA[Cristiano Ronaldo and Georgina Rodriguez have announced their engagement after eight years together, Rodriguez shared the news on Instagram, showcasing a diamond ring. Their relationship began in 2016, and they share a blended family, including five children. Rodriguez, a model and influencer, stars in her own Netflix series, 'I Am Georgina'. While Nifty50 was below 24,600, BSE Sensex was near 80,500. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/stock-market-today-nifty50-bse-sensex-august-12-2025-donald-trump-tariffs-dalal-street-indian-equities-global-markets/articleshow/123248623.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/stock-market-today-nifty50-bse-sensex-august-12-2025-donald-trump-tariffs-dalal-street-indian-equities-global-markets/articleshow/123248623.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 09:20:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="111000" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123248658,imgsize-111000.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Plane carrying 4 crashes at Montana airport</title><description><![CDATA[A Socata TBM 700 turboprop, carrying four individuals, crashed into a parked aircraft while landing at Kalispell City Airport in Montana. The collision ignited a fire that spread to a grassy area, affecting several aircraft. The pilot and passengers evacuated the plane, with two passengers sustaining minor injuries treated at the airport.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/watch-plane-carrying-4-crashes-at-montana-airport-large-fire-erupts/articleshow/123248110.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/watch-plane-carrying-4-crashes-at-montana-airport-large-fire-erupts/articleshow/123248110.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 07:54:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="3920290" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123248773,imgsize-3920290.cms"/></item><item><title>Youngest ever! 10-year-old shocks Grandmaster, sets historic chess record</title><description><![CDATA[Bodhana Sivanandan, a 10-year-old chess prodigy from Harrow, has made history as the youngest female player to defeat a grandmaster, surpassing Carissa Yip's previous record. She achieved this remarkable feat at the 2025 British Chess Championships in Liverpool, defeating Grandmaster Peter Wells.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/10-year-old-bodhana-sivanandan-shocks-grandmaster-sets-historic-chess-record/articleshow/123249296.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/10-year-old-bodhana-sivanandan-shocks-grandmaster-sets-historic-chess-record/articleshow/123249296.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 09:26:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="59696" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123249345,imgsize-59696.cms"/></item><item><title>117-million-year-old mud waves study: Atlantic’s birth revealed; key findings</title><description><![CDATA[A groundbreaking study unveils 117-million-year-old mud waves beneath the Atlantic, reshaping our understanding of its formation. These massive structures, sculpted by ancient underwater avalanches, indicate the Atlantic Ocean connected earlier than previously thought. This discovery provides insights into Cretaceous climate shifts and tectonic movements, offering crucial data for modern geology and climate science.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/new-study-finds-117-million-year-old-geological-formations-rewriting-atlantic-ocean-history/articleshow/123241522.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/new-study-finds-117-million-year-old-geological-formations-rewriting-atlantic-ocean-history/articleshow/123241522.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 08:00:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="112996" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123241697,imgsize-112996.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <description><![CDATA[Poly Medicure has revised its FY26 revenue growth guidance to around 16%, down from an earlier estimate of 20%, citing a weak June quarter impacted by slower performance in Europe. While the domestic business continues to show robust growth at about 30%, the export segment’s growth target has been lowered to 5–10%.
